commands.name: az csvmware virtual-network list
commands.summary: List details of available virtual networks in a private cloud.
examples: az csvmware virtual-network list -p MyPrivateCloud -r MyResourcePool --location eastus

commands.name: az csvmware virtual-network show
commands.summary: Get the details of a virtual network in a private cloud.
examples: az csvmware virtual-network show -n MyVirtualNetwork -p MyPrivateCloud --location eastus
